programme.title: Hamlet (1996)
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh leads an all-star cast in an adaptation of Shakespeare's great tragedy - the story of Hamlet.

programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons
programme.desc: In a film inspired by the role-playing game, the forces of good defend an empire from a diabolical mage.

programme.title: Hero at Large
programme.desc: While wearing a superhero costume, Steve thwarts a real crime and is soon hailed as a masked crime fighter.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: An oil billionaire tries to buy out the residents of a seaside village.

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Business is good for small-time grifters Roy and Frank — and then the troubled Roy learns he has a daughter.

programme.title: One Crazy Summer
programme.desc: Our story follows Hoops, who comes from a family of basketball stars but instead becomes a cartoonist.

programme.title: The Spitfire Grill
programme.desc: A woman transforms a ramshackle local restaurant, winning the hearts of townspeople…until tragedy strikes.

programme.title: Joe Versus the Volcano
programme.desc: Joe works for a hideous corporation, but everything changes when he goes on a journey around the world.

programme.title: Ladyhawke
programme.desc: Two lovers, cursed to live together yet apart as hawk and wolf, battle the evil bishop who transformed them.

programme.title: The Majestic
programme.desc: After screenwriter Peter develops amnesia in small-town 1951, he assumes the identity of a missing war hero.

programme.title: Overnight Delivery
programme.desc: They have 24 hours to stop a package, prevent a disaster ... and fall in love.

programme.title: True Stories
programme.desc: David Byrne whimsically pays homage to the mythical small Texas town of Virgil.
